value.title: Ping An Uses Artificial Intelligence to Drive New ESG Investment Strategies
value.excerpt: Access to data from alternative sources can uncover hidden risks and opportunities PR Newswire HONG KON

value.title: GitLab partners with IBM Cloud to improve collaboration for DevOps
value.excerpt: GitLab is partnering with IBM Cloud designed to help DevOps teams work more efficiently by collaborating through a shared platform.

value.title: This cute AI pet will fill the deep, dark void in your life
value.excerpt: Meet Moflin, an AI pet with “emotional capabilities that evolve like living animals.” The creature, which looks like a cross between a hamster and a slipper, won the Best of Innovation Award in Robotics at CES 2021 this week.

value.title: The best facial recognition security cameras for 2021
value.excerpt: Some home security cameras have facial recognition, an advanced feature that lets you make a database of people who regularly come to your house. Then, when the camera sees a face, it determines whether or not it belongs to someone in your list of known faces.

value.title: These five AI developments will shape 2021 and beyond
value.excerpt: Despite the travesties of 2020, artificial intelligence has quickened its progress. Baidu upped its performance across vaccines, autonomous vehicles, language processing, and quantum computing.

value.title: Machine learning tool gives early warning of cardiac issues in COVID-19 patients
value.excerpt: A team of Johns Hopkins University biomedical engineers and heart specialists have developed an algorithm that warns doctors several hours before hospitalized COVID-19 patients experience cardiac arrest or blood clots.

value.title: Even AIs can't help but turn into hateful jerks on Facebook
value.excerpt: The popular South Korean Al chatbot, Lee Luda, has been suspended from Facebook after being reported for making racist remarks, and discriminatory comments about members of the LGBTQ+ community, as well as people considered to have disabilities.

value.title: Milrem Robotics rolls out its new Type-X RCV
value.excerpt: X Robotic Combat Vehicle by the European leading robotics and autonomous systems developer Milrem Robotics passed its initial mobility

value.title: Sana Labs raises $18 million to upskill workers remotely with machine learning
value.excerpt: Sana Labs, which uses machine learning to personalize training courses for professionals, has raised $18 million.

value.title: DJI is building a new team that will work on self driving technology
value.excerpt: The popular drone making brand, DJI, is apparently building a new team that will be working on developing self driving or autonomous technologies. The company has put up various job listings and has already begun hiring as well.

value.title: Controversial chatbot leaves lessons on AI use ethics
value.excerpt: Developers of an artificial intelligence (AI) based chatbot have suspended the service after unfiltered inflammatory remarks it delivered sparked

value.title: CES 2021 Taiwanese startup FiduciaEdge Technologies develops Edge security solution for a secure edge computing environment
value.excerpt: FiduciaEdge's software/firmware platform makes edge intelligence trustworthy, while protecting data privacy at the source. With FiduciaEdge's solutions, the vulnerable edge computing landscape can be transformed into a trusted/confidential environment with ease.

value.title: This app is helping reunite dogs with their owners using AI
value.excerpt: It’s hard to imagine the stress that pet owners go through when their furry friends go missing. A US government survey suggests that 7% of lost dogs are never recovered. That’s why a startup named Shadow is trying to reunite dogs with their owners using AI.

value.title: MakinaRocks, Hyundai Robotics sign MOU to 'advance AI-based industrial robot arm anomaly detection'
value.excerpt: Enterprise AI solution provider, MakinaRocks ( announced the signing of a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with Hyundai Robotics on January 14, regarding the cooperation of the two companies in developing AI-based anomaly detection for industrial robot arms.

value.title: Microsoft president begs tech industry to improve its ethics
value.excerpt: Speaking at Microsoft's first CES keynote in 10 years, President Brad Smith said that national security is threatened by the industry's inability to learn lessons from the past.

value.title: Amazon AI Conclave 2021: Everything You Need To Know
value.excerpt: Roche, the second-largest pharmaceutical company in the world, uses Amazon SageMaker to accelerate the delivery of treatments and tailor medical experiences. And the list goes on… Data scientists, researchers,

value.excerpt: East Japan Railway Co. has acquired an equity stake in Crown Technologies with a view to using the Singapore retail tech star

value.title: Security software maker Tufin soars on raised Q4 outlook
value.excerpt: The company named software industry veteran Ray Brancato, formerly of CA Technologies, among others, as its chief revenue officer.

value.title: Autonomous vehicle startup WeRide raises $320 million
value.excerpt: WeRide, a Guangzhou, China-based startup developing autonomous vehicle systems, has raised $320 million in venture capital.

value.title: Using machine learning to predict vessel time of arrival with Amazon SageMaker
value.excerpt: According to the International Chamber of Shipping, 90% of world commerce happens at sea. Vessels are transporting every possible kind of commodity, including raw materials and semi-finished and finished goods, making ocean transportation a key component of the global supply chain. value.title: Tesla files to use new ‘millimeter-wave radar’ on its ‘full self-driving’ electric cars
value.excerpt: Tesla has applied with the FCC for the use of a new “millimeter-wave radar” for Autopilot and Full Self-Driving in its electric cars. New Tesla Radar Tesla uses a front-facing radar sensor hidden inside the front fascia of its vehicles as part of its Autopilot/Full Self-Driving (FSD) sensor suite.

value.title: Tesla’s main self-driving rival isn’t Google—it’s Intel’s Mobileye
value.excerpt: Mobileye's self-driving strategy has a number of things in common with that of Tesla, the world's most valuable automaker. Like Tesla, Mobileye is aiming to gradually evolve its current driver-assistance technology into a fully self-driving system.

value.title: Surveillance group exposes disturbing Huawei patent for AI-powered Uighur detection
value.excerpt: Researchers from IPVM revealed that Huawei and a range of other Chinese tech firms have filed patents for spotting Uighurs and other ethnic groups.
